title: Tate no Yuusha no Oshinagaki
description:
Naofumi was sent to another world, accused of rape, and betrayed by his fellow companions. Left penniless and alone, he was forced to purchase a slave in order to have a fighting chance in this world. 

Anyway, here’s a bunch of stories about them eating delicious food.

[hr]
